title: Parse task files and extract globalTickId metadata
description:
When task files change, parse the JSON and extract the globalTickId from metadata.

Requirements:
- Parse task JSON schema: id, subject, status, activeForm, metadata.globalTickId
- Match globalTickId format: owner/repo:tickId
- Filter to only tasks matching current project (compare owner/repo)
- Build in-memory map: taskListId + taskId -> tickId + task status

Files:
- internal/tickboard/server/tasks_watcher.go - Add parsing logic
- internal/tickboard/server/task_types.go (new) - Task struct definitions

Test:
- Parse sample task files from ~/.claude/tasks/
- Verify correct extraction of globalTickId
acceptance_criteria: Task files parsed correctly, globalTickId extracted and matched to project
